name: Light Determination Remastered
description:
This TD game is free and simple to play.

You just need kill enemies and defense your castle.

Upgrade your weapons  and buy some skills.

==========================================================

Full game include (0$):

  1.  50 Levels 
  2. 10 Weapons
  3. 5 Skills
  4. Custom Level 

Copper Version (3$) include :

  1. Full game
  2. Custom Level with secret enemies.

Silver Version (5$) include :

  1. Full game
  2. Custom Level with secret enemies.
  3. ???????

Game Texture (5$) include :

  1. Game Texture
  2. Game PSD file

Golden Version (8$) include :

  1. Full game 
  2. Game Texture
  3. ???????
  4. ???????
  5. Custom Level with secret enemies.

===========================================================

Demo Version is OUT.

Full Version is COMING.

 p.s THIS GAME HAVE SOME NOISE
